Hotel Amenities

Previous Next

OUR ROOMS

The 375 contemporary and tastefully decorated guestsrooms include Superior (standard) rooms, family rooms, adapted rooms, swim up rooms, family suites, suites, terrace suites, king suites, a honeymoon suite, a presidential suite and 3 suites with private pool. Most of the rooms are sea view and side sea view offer a crystal clear view of the surrounding sandy beach of Makronissos and they are fully equipped with the latest technology facilities and amenities to satisfy our special guests.

View Rooms
Previous Next

RESTAURANTS & BARS

The main restaurant offers various theme buttet nights on alternate such as Cyprus “meze”, Italian, Tropical (Caribbean & Oriental specialties), Fiesta Mediteranneo, Festival de specialties, BBQ, Tex – Mex., Flambé & Fish Gala dinners (are particular specialties), Soirée crêperie.

View Rooms
Previous Next

Special Events

Enter the world of weddings at the King Evelthon Beach Hotel & Resort and be engulfed in an atmosphere of hospitality and comfort. This is the most important day of your life and deserves to be perfect.

The Royal Beach Wedding Venue at the King Evelthon Beach Hotel & Resort is located by the sea and has everything to offer the special couple, with panoramic views of the Mediterranean crystal seas, private beach and an atmosphere to enhance your special day.

View Rooms

King Evelthon Beach Hotel & Resort is a five star hotel in Paphos, Cyprus located close to the resort centre and the pedestrian area with its many colourful attractions. King Evelthon Beach Hotel & Resort is directly located on the beach of Chlorakas.
